Detailed Description

TREX clock.

This class defines the abstract interface to the Clock that manage the TICK advance.

Author:
Conor McGann

void TREX::agent::Clock::advanceTick ( TREX::transaction::TICK &  tick  )  [protected]

increment tick value

Parameters:
tick A tick variable

increase the value of tick by 1

Deprecated:
This method was used for computing extra stats. We need to find a better approach. Specifically it would be relevant to have the tick variable located on this class.

virtual TREX::transaction::TICK TREX::agent::Clock::getNextTick (  )  [pure virtual]

get time in TICK

This method is used to compute the current time. This is where one specialization of clock will identify whether the TICK value has advanced or not

Returns:
current tick value

Implemented in TREX::agent::RealTimeClock, and TREX::agent::StepClock.
